title: False Alliance
desc:
Post 2387
- Ask the next player to be your ally.
- If they agree, you get to choose half of your hand (rounded down) to give to them in **Stoned** form, and the next player gains 3 **Gloom**.
- Otherwise, you gain 3 **Gloom**.
- When played, appears as <:partisan:1107460550268559380> Alliance (2386) and can be played on the same cards as an actual <:partisan:1107460550268559380> 6 card.
- Reveals its true form after the next player makes their decision.
